scene_target: Artie equips the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion and escapes the mob-infested shop.
goal: Claim the high-evasion gear and survive the immediate aggro threat.
conflict: The shop is collapsing and swarming with mobs; Artie must equip the gear before taking any damage.
end_condition: Artie is safely away from the shop, wearing the neon yellow cloak.

last_scene: Artie snatched the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion from its pedestal as Barnaby's shop collapsed under the weight of an aggro-crazed mob.
He successfully triggered multiple evasion procs to survive lethal blows from a butcher and a thief before fleeing into the backstreets.
The Coward's Sprint passive allowed him to outrun his pursuers, though he remains a high-visibility target due to the cloak's neon glow.
key_events: Artie equipped the Cloak of the Cowardly Lion (+50 Evasion, -100 Dignity).
Artie survived two lethal attacks via Evasion procs (50% chance) against a butcher and a thief.
The Aggro Meter remained at 99% Critical Density throughout the escape.
Artie activated the Coward's Sprint passive, increasing his movement speed by 20% while fleeing.
Barnaby's Bargains & Blunders collapsed, temporarily blocking the mob's pursuit.
Artie escaped into the backstreets of Oakhaven as a neon-yellow fugitive.
